about_the_game:
CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Muscle Victor's fans!

A must-have for all Muscle Victor enthusiasts, this DLC included limited characters like Muscle Victor, parts, titles, and other exclusive items! Don't pass this chance up!

Pack Contents (Robots)
  • Muscle Victor.

Pack Contents (Parts)
    • Barbell (x1)
    • Muscle Cannon (x1)
    • Title (x1)
    • Title [Power is Power]（x1）
    • Title [Muscle is the Best Defense]（x1）
    • Title [Brain Muscle]（x1）
    Pack Conents (Other)
      [*Cosmo Harmonics 20%（x30）
    • Tune-Up Set 10（x5）
    • ALL×3 Ticket 1h（x3）

    ※Purchase of this Pack is limited to one per account.
    ※The Zero Saber visible in the screenshot is not included in this Pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce4 / ATI RADEON 8500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Core2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 2900
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
